metadata.feature_description: Mention users in posts and comments using @ symbol

steps.action: Navigate to Community page with Activity Stream
steps.expected: Activity Stream page loads with post creation area visible
steps.actual: Activity Stream page loaded successfully showing existing posts and 'Tell the world something...' input area

steps.action: Observe existing post with single user mention
steps.expected: Post should contain @mention displayed as a clickable link to user profile
steps.actual: Found post 'Hello SuperUser Account, this is a mention test!' with 'SuperUser Account' rendered as a clickable link pointing to /en-us/Activity-Feed/userId/1

steps.action: Observe existing post with multiple user mentions
steps.expected: Post should contain multiple @mentions each displayed as clickable links
steps.actual: Found post 'Multiple mentions test: Hey SuperUser Account and SuperUser Account again, check this out!' with both mentions rendered as separate clickable links

steps.action: Observe existing comment with user mention
steps.expected: Comment should contain @mention displayed as a clickable link
steps.actual: Found comment 'Great post! SuperUser Account this is a comment mention test!' with 'SuperUser Account' rendered as a clickable link to user profile

steps.action: Click on post creation area and type @Test
steps.expected: Auto-complete dropdown should appear with matching users
steps.actual: Auto-complete dropdown appeared showing 'Test User', 'Test User01', 'Test User02', 'Test User03', 'Test User04', 'Test User05' and more matching users

steps.action: Observe existing post with non-existent user mention attempt
steps.expected: Non-existent username should not be converted to a link, should appear as plain text
steps.actual: Found post 'Testing non-existent user mention: Hello are you there?' - the attempted mention appears as plain text with no clickable link, as expected from code review (UserMentionsController removes invalid user IDs)

steps.action: Observe notification badge in Activity Stream page
steps.expected: Notification system should show notifications including mention notifications
steps.actual: Notification badge visible in top navigation showing notifications. Code review confirms UserMentionNotificationsController.SendUserMentionedNotification() is called when posts/comments with mentions are created (ActivityStreamServicesController.cs:242-243)

steps.action: Click on 'SuperUser Account' mention link in a post
steps.expected: Should navigate to the mentioned user's Activity Feed profile page
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to http://localhost:8081/en-us/Activity-Feed/userId/1 - User profile page displayed showing 'SuperUser Account' with stats (Friends: 0, Following: 0, Followers: 0, Points: 58) and Activity Feed tab

observations: User mentions are stored using token format [UM_ID:xxx] in the database and rendered as HTML links with class 'evoq-mention-link' and data-mention attribute
Auto-complete API endpoint is 'Social/GetAvailableUsersForMentioning' which returns matching users based on input
UserMentionsController handles conversion between token format and HTML links - invalid user IDs are silently removed
UserMentionNotificationsController sends notifications to mentioned users when posts/comments are created
Mention links point to the user's Activity Feed profile at /en-us/Activity-Feed/userId/{id}
